description: Image read and write functions from torchvision.io

read_image.title: read_image
read_image.tooltip: Reads a JPEG or PNG image into a 3 dimensional RGB or grayscale Tensor. Optionally converts the image to the desired format. The values of the output tensor are uint8 in [0, 255].
read_image.externalImports:
from torchvision import io
from torchvision.io import ImageReadMode

path.title: path
path.tooltip: path(str) - path of the JPEG or PNG image.

mode.title: mode
mode.tooltip: mode(ImageReadMode) - The read mode used for optionally converting the image. Default: ImageReadMode.UNCHANGED.

image.title: image
image.tooltip: {dataType: torch.tensor, value, layout: [chw], colorMode: [rgb, grayscale], intensityRange: 0-255' device: cpu}

write_jpeg.title: write_jpeg
write_jpeg.tooltip: Takes an input tensor in CHW layout and saves it in a JPEG file.

input.title: input
input.tooltip: input (Tensor[channels, image_height, image_width]) - int8 image tensor of c channels, where c must be 1 or 3.

filename.title: filename
filename.tooltip: filename(str) - Path to save the image.

quality.title: quality
quality.tooltip: quality (int) - Quality of the resulting JPEG file, it must be a number between 1 and 100. Default: 75
